statements: SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date, experiment_duration FROM ExperimentResults;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_result FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM ExperimentResults
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_duration ASC
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_duration > INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_result FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_result ->> 'success' = 'true'
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_duration FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM experiment_results
SELECT experiment_name, result_data FROM experiment_results
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM experiment_metrics
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment_results ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT experiment_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM experiment_metrics WHERE metric_value > 10
SELECT * FROM experiment_results ORDER BY experiment_date DESC, experiment_name ASC
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, result_data FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM experiment_results JOIN experiment_metrics ON experiment_results.experiment_id = experiment_metrics.experiment_id
SELECT experiment_name, result_data FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_name LIKE '%A%' AND result_data->>'status' = 'complete'

SELECT experiment_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM experiment_results INNER JOIN experiment_metrics ON experiment_results.experiment_id = experiment_metrics.experiment_id ORDER BY experiment_results.experiment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ExperimentData;
SELECT experiment_name, result_value FROM ExperimentData WHERE result_value > 10;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM SampleDetails ORDER BY sample_type DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, result_value FROM ExperimentData WHERE result_value < 5 ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, log_timestamp FROM ExperimentData JOIN ExperimentLogs ON ExperimentData.experiment_id = ExperimentLogs.experiment_id;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, experiment_name, sample_id, result_value FROM ExperimentData WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type, created_date FROM SampleDetails WHERE sample_type = 'Control' ORDER BY created_date DESC;

SELECT experiment_id, log_id, log_timestamp FROM ExperimentLogs JOIN ExperimentData ON ExperimentLogs.experiment_id = ExperimentData.experiment_id WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type FROM SampleDetails WHERE sample_type = 'Experimental' ORDER BY sample_name ASC, created_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM ExperimentLogs GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_value, measurement_time FROM measurements WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY measurement_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiments INNER JOIN researchers ON experiments.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;

SELECT experiment_name, measurement_value FROM experiments INNER JOIN measurements ON experiments.experiment_id = measurements.experiment_id WHERE measurements.measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY measurements.measurement_time DESC;

SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(experiment_id) AS total_experiments FROM experiments INNER JOIN researchers ON experiments.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING total_experiments > 3 ORDER BY total_experiments DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY RAND();
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT result_id, result_value FROM results WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_department FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM experiments_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'location';
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, result_value FROM experiments LEFT JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_department FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT condition_name, condition_description FROM experimental_conditions;
